subject: Re: Billing
preview: Hi Olga,  Thanks for clarifying that. Noted on the Melbourne office.  I’ve attached the invoice as requested.   This invoice was issued before the billing email was updated, so you’ll see the old

action.text: Victoria Victoria assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi Olga,

Thanks for clarifying that. Noted on the Melbourne office.

I’ve attached the invoice as requested.

This invoice was issued before the billing email was updated, so you’ll see the old billing contact listed on it.

And yes, you're right, payments are processed automatically via the credit card on file.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need!

Hi Victoria,

Thanks for that

Melbourne office is separate from us in terms of billing, there is no need to change their email

Would you be able to send me the invoice for this charge on 15.06?

As I understand, we are on automatic payment from cc?

Kind regards,

Olga

action.text: Victoria Victoria assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi David and Olga,

Confirming we’ve updated the billing email for Novari Mel & Syd and Renta Centre to: admin@novaricollective.com

Also, the credit card charge on 15.06 for $1668 was for the Lite Website Care Plan for syd-proposal.novaricollective.com.au.

Let me know if you have any questions or need any help.

Good morning Joel,

In a meanwhile, could you help me locate invoice for credit card charge on the 15.06 for $1668

I have attached the invoice

Kind regards,

I hope you're doing well.

Just to confirm — are you requesting this change for the CarePlan monthly invoices/emails? At this stage, we don't have a customer portal available, but we're more than happy to provide copies of previous invoices upon request. Could you please let us know which site(s) you'd like the invoices for?
